title: SABO REVEALED! BELIEVE IT! | One Piece Episode 494 Couples Reaction & Discussion
author: Unknown Reactor
description: A couples reaction video to One Piece Episode 494, focusing on Sabo's reveal and the emotional impact of the episode.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Contains spoilers for the Marineford aftermath and Luffy's childhood flashback arc

title: LUFFY, ACE & SABO!! THE FAMILY IS FORMED! - One Piece Episode 493 + 494 REACTION + REVIEW!
author: Unknown Reactor
description: A combined reaction and review covering episodes 493 and 494, focusing on the formation of the ASL brothers' bond.

title: Anime Review: One Piece 494-496
author: @populationgo
description: A detailed written review analyzing episodes 494-496 of One Piece, highlighting the torture scene as one of the darkest moments in the series, particularly impactful due to Luffy being only 10 years old. The review emphasizes this as a defining character moment showing Luffy's incredible will and loyalty.

title: 494: Here Comes Sabo! The Boy at the Gray Terminal
author: Never Watched One Piece
description: A blog post from someone watching One Piece for the first time, documenting their reaction to episode 494 and the introduction of Sabo.
